name: CrowdNoise
0:
”Alexa, open crowd noise”
”Alexa, start crowd noise”
”Alexa, launch crowd noise”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crowd noise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need a little energy from the crowd? Don't worry, we've got you covered. Crowd Noise provides an hour of continuous looping crowd noise giving anyone their own army of cheering fans! Crowd Noise is the perfect Amazon Alexa Skill for watching your favorite sporting event in the age of social distancing (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, Soccer etc.), for live sporting events with small crowds, live streaming concerts for musicians or if you feel the need to have your own fan club! Download crowd noise today because who wants to watch football without Crowd Noise!

If you enable Crowd Noise and decide to leave a review please let us know how you're using the skill so we can 
optimize and enhance your experience!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
